description:
Add Awaiting field to Tick struct in internal/tick/tick.go

Field specification:
- Name: Awaiting
- Type: *string (pointer for optional/nullable)
- JSON tag: json:"awaiting,omitempty"
- Valid values: null, "work", "approval", "input", "review", "content", "escalation", "checkpoint"

Purpose: Indicates the tick is waiting for human action. Null means agent's turn (default), any other value means human's turn. This field is transient - it gets set/cleared as tasks move between agent and human.

Awaiting value meanings:
- work: Human must complete the task itself
- approval: Agent done, needs human sign-off
- input: Agent needs information from human
- review: PR needs code review
- content: UI/copy needs human judgment
- escalation: Agent found issue, needs direction
- checkpoint: Phase complete, verify before next

Implementation notes:
- Add field after Requires field in struct
- Add validation in Validate() method for valid enum values
- This replaces the semantics of the Manual field (awaiting=work â‰ˆ manual=true)
